profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2013-07-26T16:17-0700
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

did.abstract: The collection consists of serials, pamphlets, and leaflets issued by nationalist, fascist, and religious organizations in Saint Petersburg, Russia, relating to political conditions in Russia. They were collected by Irina Levinskaia and Iurii Lesman.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Levinskaia-Lesman collection, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 2001.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Note
bioghist.p: Irina Levinskaia is a senior research fellow at the St. Petersburg Institute of History and the former editor of Bar'er, an anti-fascist journal. Iurii Lesman is a research fellow at the State Hermitage Museum in St. Petersburg.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of serials, pamphlets, and leaflets issued by nationalist, fascist, and religious organizations in Saint Petersburg, Russia, relating to political conditions in Russia. They were collected by I.A. Levinskaia and IUrii Lesman.
An itemized list in Russian matching the item number with a title and other information created by Levinskaia may be found below.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: An itemized list in Russian matching the item number with a title and other information created by Levinskaia.

did.unittitle: Dokumenty partii i organizatsii, osushchestvliavshikh svoiu deiatel'nost' na territorii Sankt-Peterburga (Documents of parties and organizations active in St. Petersburg)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of serials, pamphlets, bulletins, leaflets, and posters created by political and religious groups active in St. Petersburg. Arranged by organization name in Russian alphabetical order

did.unittitle: Vsemirnyi antisionistskii front. Vsesoiuznyi antisionistskii front. Patrioty. A.Z. Romanenko,

Dukhovnyi soiuz "Tezaurus." Dobrovol'noe obshchestvo "Oazis." Sankt-Peterburgskii Muzhskoi Klub. AO "LPK Vita." Grazhdanskoe ob"edinenie "Rossy." Russkoe osvoboditel'noe dvizhenie (ROD). Russkaia Druzhina,
Leningradskaia oblastnaia pisatelskaia organizatsiia SP RSFSR,
Obshchestvennyi komitet v zashchitu Serbii i Chernogorii,
Organizatsiia osvobozhdeniia Rossii ot evreiskoi okkupatsii,
Prosvetitel'skoe obshchestvo "Za sotsializm" Kuibyshevskogo raiona Leningrada,
Studencheskoe dobrovol'noe ob"edinenie po sokhraneniiu russkogo natsional'nogo kul'turnogo dostoianiia "Feniks,"
Kommunisticheskie i blizkie k nim partii i organizatsii,
Obshchestvenno-politicheskoe ob"edinenie Leningrada i Leningradskoi oblasti ?Kommunisty za prava grazhdan,?
Deiatel'nost' novykh religioznykh techenii v Sankt-Peterburge,
Pravoslavnaia tserkov' protiv nepravoslavnykh religioznykh techenii,
Periodicheskie izdaniia, rasprostraniavshiesia v Sankt-Peterburge (Periodicals circulated in St. Petersburg)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of newspapers and magazines published by monarchist, nationalist, communist, and religious groups. Arranged by organization type and thereunder in Russian alphabetical order

did.unittitle: Izdavaemaia v Sankt-Peterburge i rasprostraniaemaia aktivistami natsional'no-patrioticheskikh organizatsii periodika, v vykhodnykh dannykh kotoroi ne oboznachena sviaz' s etimi organizatsiiami,
Izdavaemaia v Sankt-Peterburge i rasprostraniaemaia aktivistami kommunisticheskikh organizatsii periodika, v vykhodnykh dannykh kotoroi ne oboznachena sviaz' s etimi organizatsiiami,
Moskovskie i regional'nye gazety Rossiiskoi Kommunisticheskoi rabochei partii,
Regional'naia kommunisticheskaia pressa, v vykhodnykh dannykh kotoroi ne oboznachena sviaz' s konkretnymi organizatsiiami,
Regional'nye gazety Vsesoiuznoi kommunisticheskoi partii bol'shevikov (VKPB),
Regional'nye gazety Vsesoiuznoi kommunisticheskoi partii bol'shevikov (VKPB),
Natsionalisticheskie i konservativno-pravoslavnye periodicheskie izdaniia, poluchennye po podpiske,
Natsionalisticheskie i konservativno-pravoslavnye periodicheskie izdaniia, poluchennye po podpiske,
Natsionalisticheskie i konservativno-pravoslavnye periodicheskie izdaniia, poluchennye po podpiske,
Natsionalisticheskie i konservativno-pravoslavnye periodicheskie izdaniia, poluchennye po podpiske,
Natsionalisticheskie i konservativno-pravoslavnye periodicheskie izdaniia, poluchennye po podpiske,
Natsionalisticheskie i konservativno-pravoslavnye periodicheskie izdaniia, poluchennye po podpiske,
Natsionalisticheskie periodicheskie izdaniia, poluchennye ot izdatel'ia,
Natsionalisticheskie periodicheskie izdaniia, poluchennye ot izdatel'ia,
Problemy mezhnatsional'nykh otnoshenii, kommunisticheskogo dvizheniia i konfessional'nykh organizatsii v moskovskikh i regional'nykh malotirazhnykh periodicheskikh izdaniiakh,
Neperiodicheskie izdaniia, rasprostraniavshiesia v Sankt-Peterburge (Non-periodicals circulated in St. Petersburg)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of pamphlets, books, leaflets, newspapers inserts, and brochures published by religious, communist, and nationalist groups. Includes reprints of Russian nationalist literature from before 1917. Arranged in Russian alphabetical order by author or title

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of flyers, newspapers, clippings, and pamphlets relating to Russian national and St. Petersburg local elections. Arranged by election and ordered chronologically

did.unittitle: Vybory deputatov Verkhovnogo Soveta RSFSR i deputatov Lengorsoveta,
Vybory deputatov Verkhovnogo Soveta RSFSR i deputatov Lengorsoveta,
Vybory v Gosudarstvennuiu Dumu RF i referendum po proektu Konstitutsii,
Vybory v Gorodskoe Sobranie Sankt Peterburga,
Vybory v organy mestnogo samoupravleniia Sankt-Peterburga,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of newspapers, leaflets, clippings, pamphlets, and books published by democratic and anti-fascist groups in St. Petersburg. Arranged in categories such as anti-Fascist, Jewish, and human rights publications

did.unittitle: Rabochie materialy po protivodeistviiu fashizmu, natsionalizmu, natsional'noi diskriminatsii,
Obshchie problemy zashchity prav cheloveka, prav natsional'nykh men'shinstv i prochie,
Materialy demokraticheskikh i blizkikh k nim partii i organizatsii,
Evreiskie izdaniia, posviashchennye problemam borby s antisemitizmom,
